sentences.sContent: Seeral of the findings in the paper indicate an extraordinary degree of heterogeneity in the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Seeral of the findings in the paper indicate an extraordinary degree of heterogeneity in the brain.
sentences.sCn: 本篇文章中的许多结果都显示了脑中存在的一种特殊的异质性。

sentences.sContent: In tropical areas, larger plots have proved more useful due to greater heterogeneity of the forest.
sentences.sContent_eng: In tropical areas, larger plots have proved more useful due to greater heterogeneity of the forest.
sentences.sCn: 在热带地区，由于森林的异质性较大，已证实大一些的样地更有效。

sentences.sContent: Such political communities are characterized by heterogeneity and difference with no shared object of design.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such political communities are characterized by heterogeneity and difference with no shared object of design.
sentences.sCn: 这样的政治共同体的特征是不会共享别人的设计的异质性和区别。

synos.tran: [生物]异质性；[物][矿业][化学]不均匀性；多相性

remMethod.val: hetero (异) + gene (产生) + ity → 异质性

words.tran: [化学] 多相的；异种的；[化学] 不均匀的；由不同成分形成的
异质的；[生物] 异源的；异种的
